author: Alex Jones
title: Breaking! US Military Warns Of Martial Law Takeover Plan
text:
Breaking! US Military Warns Of Martial Law Takeover Plan Will military and law enforcement be tricked into turning against Trump? Alex Jones | Infowars.com - February 16, 2017 Comments 
The intelligence community, the mainstream media and the corrupt DC establishment are waging a coup against President Donald Trump attempting to sabotage the first days of his presidency. 
Alex Jones explains the engineered takedown of society and ties it in with previous military training targeting the American people.
